title: Dev Patel Brought His Mom to the Oscars - Oscars 2017
text: Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Best Supporting Actor nominee Dev Patel pulled a Leonardo DiCaprio and brought his mom as his Oscars date on Sunday night, and as you might expect, it was the cutest thing ever. Dev could not look happier to have his mom on his arm, and she could not look happier to have a son who‚Äôs nominated for an Oscar. Then, during Dev‚Äôs red-carpet interview with Ryan Seacrest, he and his mom held hands, thus confirming that your crush on him is justified for all eternity.
